ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | recxpcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | recxpcld.2 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) |
| 3 |  | divcxpd.4 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) |
| 4 |  | divcxpd.5 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_divcxp | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ B e. RR+ /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A / B ) ^c C ) = ( ( A ^c C ) / ( B ^c C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl211anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) ^c C ) = ( ( A ^c C ) / ( B ^c C ) ) ) |
